First, load package. “Stories” primary objects work Pivotal Tracker. ’re issues—features, bugs, chores—track. life cycle, created, may linger “icebox” waiting scheduled “backlog”, started, go stages finally “accepted” done. Pivotal API lets query project’s stories freely. easiest way use searching interface use web application. lots different fields filter ways select certain stories; covered length API documentation. Let’s find open bug reports project. Hooray, two bugs! However, note made search lots results, getStories() handles API’s pagination . return search matches, even needs multiple API requests . don’t need worry details API .
